content: Omg I just realized it also has hover support :open_mouth: . Is the styling configurable? I can't remember if mutable and ownership consuming functions are supposed to be highlighted differently (could just be my local customizations).

Not yet. For now a dark theme (Coal, Navy, Ayu) should be set to make it visible. I don't know how to make it theme sensitive or user configurable, I need to play with it more.

if mutable and ownership consuming functions are supposed to be highlighted differently

Semantic highlighting isn't there and it still uses mdbook's hightlightjs.
